and.attribute: Thôn Vĩnh Bảo, Xã Vĩnh Khúc, Huyện Văn Giang, Tỉnh Hưng Yên

The production manager oversees all bulk production of goods and flow of products through the treatment process. 1. Manages production and plant workers. 2. Works with quality manager on any issues that arise during production. 3. Ensures all products are treated as to specific requirements. 4. Works with planning manager on timeline for production. 5. Writes weekly report for USA office. 6. Works with plant engineer on equipment maintenance and upkeep.

- Graduate university with technical major - Factory/plant management, Knowledge of machinery & equipment, Textile/garment manufacturing experience a plus - English – spoken and written, Computer – proficient in Word & Excel - Good knowledge of the manufacturing concepts - Communication and organization skills - Problem solving skills

and.attribute: Insect Shield® Technology is a USA based global leader in insect repellent textile application (www.insectshield.com). The technology is used by over 40 leading lifestyle brands, work wear distributors and International relief organizations across the globe to provide effective protection against insects and the diseases they can carry. Our new factory in Hung Yen province will bring this revolutionary technology to Vietnam market. Successful candidates will assist in opening our new facility and establishing a high quality operations team. More jobs from this employer
